div.div:
Bright Beginnings School is a private preschool and public charter elementary school serving bright and curious students 3 years old through 6th grade.
Bright Beginnings offers an accelerated program that gives students a strong academic foundation, while also providing a well-rounded, liberal arts education.

div.class: has_ae_slider elementor-element elementor-element-d92213a ae-bg-gallery-type-default elementor-column elementor-col-33 elementor-top-column

elementor-element elementor-element-156229f pp-info-list-icon-vertical-top pp-info-list-icon-left elementor-widget elementor-widget-pp-info-list

div.div: Excellent specials, including art, music, Spanish and wellness/PE
Smaller class sizes with experienced, well-qualified teachers and aide support, so students receive more individualized attention
Whole elementary school participation in the All Things EQ program to develop character, social and emotional intelligence
Strong parent involvement in classrooms, on field trips, and in the active PTA

div.div: Arizona Department of Education “A” rated school
Niche 2020 Best Schools in America – Top 10 Best Public Elementary School in Arizona
Preschool voted 2nd best in Chandler by East Valley Tribune 2018
Phoenix Business Journal ranked #7 on the list of top elementary schools in the Phoenix area
